file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1 info: description: APIs to interface with communications tax engine.
The API requires Basic authentication.
Users with access to multiple clients must also set request header parameter for client_id.
Set client_profile_id to specify profile to be used for taxation.

Effective January 1st, 2022 all Avalara products will be enforcing TLS 1.2 server-side. Please ensure that your implementation sets a minimal of TLS 1.2 encryption when making web requests to Avalara APIs. title: SaasPro version: v2 servers: - url: / security: - Basic: [] paths: /api/v2/afc/CalcTaxes: post: requestBody: content: application/json-patch+json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CalcTaxesRequest' application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CalcTaxesRequest' text/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CalcTaxesRequest' application/*+json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CalcTaxesRequest' description: "CalcTaxesRequest object containing invoices to process and data\ \ required \r\n for performing tax calculations." responses: "200": content: text/plain: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CalcTaxesResponse' application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CalcTaxesResponse' text/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CalcTaxesResponse' description: Success summary: Performs tax calculations on all invoices and line items within the request body. tags: -
